text: Born Free is a 1966 British American family adventure drama movie directed by James Hill and was based on the 1960 novel of the same name by Joy Adamson. It stars Virginia McKenna, Bill Travers, Geoffrey Keen, Peter Lukoye and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It won 2 Academy Awards in 1967. It spawned spin-offs and sequels. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1966 adventure movies Category:1966 drama movies Category:1960s family movies Category:British family movies Category:British drama movies Category:British adventure movies Category:American family movies Category:American drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by James Hill Category:Movies composed by John Barry Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies set in Australia Category:Movies set in Kenya Category:Movies set in Papua New Guinea Category:Movies about orphans Category:Movies about lions
title: Born Free
